_key.description: Unique identifier for the genomic element to gene edge

_from.description: The from node of the genomic element to gene edge

_to.description: The to node of the genomic element to gene edge

source.description: The source of the genomic element to gene edge

source_url.description: The source URL of the genomic element to gene edge

files_filesets.description: The filesets of the genomic element to gene edge

label.description: The label of the genomic element to gene edge
label.example: element effect on gene expression of ENSG00000123685
label.pattern: ^element effect on gene expression of ENSG[0-9]{11}(?:_PAR_Y)?$

name.description: The name of the genomic element to gene edge

inverse_name.description: The inverse name of the genomic element to gene edge

method.description: The method of the genomic element to gene edge

simple_sample_summaries.description: The simple sample summaries of the genomic element to gene edge

biological_context.description: The biological context of the genomic element to gene edge

treatments_term_ids.description: The treatments term ids of the genomic element to gene edge

p_val.description: The p-value of the genomic element to gene edge

avg_log2FC.description: The average log2 fold change of the genomic element to gene edge

pct_1.description: The percentage of the genomic element to gene edge

pct_2.description: The percentage of the genomic element to gene edge

p_val_adj.description: The adjusted p-value of the genomic element to gene edge

effect_size.description: The effect size of the genomic element to gene edge
